name: ncmb
description: JavaScript SDK for NiftyCloud mobile backend

scripts.test: nohup npm run stub:start & sleep 5 && NODE_ENV=test mocha -R list test/**_test.js && npm run cov:80 && npm run stub:stop
scripts.test:frontend:modules: lodash -o test/frontend/lodash.js && cat node_modules/mocha/mocha.js node_modules/chai/chai.js test/frontend/lodash.min.js > test/frontend/test_modules.js
scripts.test:frontend:testfile: cat test/frontend/header.js test/**_test.js test/frontend/footer.js |sed -e '/require(.*)/d' -e '/use strict/d' > test/frontend/ncmb_test.js
scripts.test:frontend:build: npm run test:frontend:testfile && cat test/frontend/test_modules.js test/frontend/module_setup.js test/frontend/ncmb_test.js test/frontend/test_run.js > test/frontend/www/ncmb_test.full.js
scripts.test:frontend:prepare: mkdir -p test/frontend/www/css && npm run test:frontend:build && cp test/frontend/index.html ncmb.min.js test/frontend/config.js test/frontend/www && cp node_modules/mocha/mocha.css test/frontend/www/css
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/**_test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.coverage_: nohup npm run stub:start & sleep 5 && NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha -- -R spec test/**_test.js && npm run stub:stop
scripts.cov:80: npm run coverage 2>&1 | grep Lines | perl -nle 'my ($l, $c, $p, @d) = split(/[\s%]+/); exit(($p > 80) == 0)'
